description: Changelog for Hivemind - Local-first observable orchestration for agentic development

changes.description: Add `project delete`, `task delete`, `graph delete`, and `flow delete` commands with explicit dependency and active-state safety checks
Introduce event-sourced delete events (`ProjectDeleted`, `TaskDeleted`, `TaskGraphDeleted`, `TaskFlowDeleted`) and derived-state projection handling for entity removal
Expose delete endpoints in `src/server.rs`: `/api/projects/delete`, `/api/tasks/delete`, `/api/graphs/delete`, and `/api/flows/delete`
Update CLI semantics and capability docs to document delete command preconditions, effects, events, and failure modes
Add `flow restart` to recreate aborted flows from the same graph with copied run mode, dependencies, and flow-level runtime defaults
Add `attempt list` and `checkpoint list` commands to improve attempt/checkpoint discoverability for operators and automation
Improve `worktree cleanup` output to report how many worktrees were cleaned (or would be cleaned in dry-run mode)
Add unit and integration coverage for flow restart semantics, attempt/checkpoint listing, and cleanup feedback UX
Update quickstart and CLI semantics for flow restart, attempt/checkpoint list commands, and cleanup output behavior
Refresh beta testing fix report templates in `ops/process` and `ops/reports` with standardized validation, DX, and PR/CI tracking sections
Extend `runtime_started` events to include the effective runtime prompt payload and command flags used to launch the runtime
Add integration coverage asserting `runtime_started` carries prompt and flags for flow tick runtime execution
Document `runtime_started` prompt/flags payload fields in CLI semantics and event replay design docs

Harden scope enforcement for wrapper runtimes by capturing per-attempt repository and ambient baselines, validating post-run drift, and emitting scope violations for unauthorized out-of-worktree writes
Complete `attempt inspect --context` output to return assembled retry context when available in event history
Require `worktree cleanup --force` for running flows, add `--dry-run` support, and emit `worktree_cleanup_performed` audit events
On flow abort, transition active task executions to failed with explicit `flow_aborted` failure events and attempt correlation
Record flow-correlated `error_occurred` events when `merge prepare` is blocked by `flow_not_completed` preconditions

Add regression coverage for scope violations outside worktrees, attempt context inspection, running-flow cleanup force requirements, abort-state consistency, merge precondition observability, and dependency-chain readiness ordering
Update scope enforcement, CLI semantics, and quickstart docs to reflect current scope-detection mechanics, cleanup safety flags/events, abort transitions, and retry-context inspection
Add flow and task run modes (`manual`/`auto`) with scheduler enforcement so manual tasks are not automatically dispatched
Add inter-flow dependency edges and auto-start dependent auto-mode flows when upstream flows complete
Add runtime defaults and overrides at global/project/flow/task scope with explicit worker/validator role selection and deterministic precedence
Add `task set-run-mode`, `flow set-run-mode`, `flow add-dependency`, `flow runtime-set`, and `runtime defaults-set` commands plus role-aware `runtime health` arguments
Add merge execution mode selection (`local` or `pr`) with optional CI monitoring, auto-merge request, and pull-after behavior for PR mode
Extend registry coverage for task manual mode, runtime precedence, and dependent-flow auto-start behavior
Update quickstart, CLI semantics, and architecture docs for run modes, inter-flow dependencies, runtime precedence, and PR merge execution options
Deprecate interactive flow ticks with explicit `interactive_mode_deprecated` errors and guidance to run non-interactive `flow tick`
Add regression coverage for runtime output capture when runtime command arguments include nested quoting
Expand runtime projection heuristics to recognize TODO/DONE prefixes and common runtime narrative status lines
Add projection tests for TODO prefix snapshots and runtime narrative status lines plus registry coverage for interactive deprecation
Update CLI semantics and architecture docs to document interactive deprecation and current flow tick behavior
Add beta testing fix report for tier-4 RUN-003/RUN-004/RUN-005 stabilization outcomes
Extend `events list` and `events stream` with correlation filters (`--graph`, `--flow`, `--task`, `--attempt`) and RFC3339 time-window filters (`--since`, `--until`)
Enhance EventFilter matching with timestamp bounds to support deterministic historical queries and streaming windows
Add event store coverage for time-range filtering and CLI integration coverage for new event query/stream filters and invalid time-range handling
Mark Phase 29 complete in roadmap and update CLI/quickstart/capabilities docs for correlation and time-range observability queries
Add Phase 29 execution report including manual `hivemind-test` validation with captured start/end timestamps and event query evidence
Add Codex, Claude Code, and Kilo runtime adapters with shared execution/interactive semantics and health checks
Introduce `hivemind runtime list` and `hivemind runtime health` for adapter discovery and diagnostics
Support task-level runtime override via `task runtime-set` with event-sourced TaskRuntimeConfigured/TaskRuntimeCleared state transitions
Runtime execution now resolves effective runtime per task (override or project default) while preserving existing TaskFlow event semantics and projection behavior
Harden runtime event projection by normalizing ANSI/control-prefixed output so command/tool markers are observable from real runtime streams
Extend registry tests for runtime catalog coverage, codex adapter execution, and task runtime override precedence
Mark Phase 28 complete and update quickstart/runtime/CLI semantics docs for multi-runtime operation
Provision task worktrees across all attached repositories and propagate dependency branch integration in each repo before runtime execution
Inject multi-repo runtime context/env (`HIVEMIND_PRIMARY_WORKTREE`, `HIVEMIND_ALL_WORKTREES`, per-repo worktree env vars) so agents can operate across repos in a single attempt
Enforce repository scope per repo during verification; writes in undeclared/read-only repos now fail the attempt
Extend merge prepare/execute to multi-repo flows with taskflow-level all-or-nothing merge guarantees and best-effort rollback of partially merged repos
Add registry coverage for multi-repo merge preparation and atomic merge failure handling
Mark Phase 27 complete in roadmap and document Phase 27 runtime/scope mechanics in design docs
Introduce concurrency governance in Registry::tick_flow with multi-dispatch scheduling, scope-aware conflict telemetry, and global concurrency cap parsing
Expose --max-parallel on flow tick and --max-parallel-tasks on project runtime-set, plus surface new scheduling telemetry via server API
Emit ScopeConflictDetected/TaskSchedulingDeferred events and persist max_parallel_tasks policy in ProjectRuntimeConfigured
Rewrite Phase 26 roadmap, update architecture/design/quickstart docs to describe concurrency governance and global caps
Extend unit coverage for scheduling conflicts/global cap parsing and document manual hivemind-test validation scenarios
Implement checkpoint lifecycle model with AttemptCheckpoint state, checkpoint events (Declared/Activated/Completed/AllCompleted), and canonical checkpoint commit generation
Introduce `hivemind checkpoint complete --attempt-id <id> --id <checkpoint>` for agents/runtimes to mark checkpoints done with optional summaries
Gate task completion on checkpoints, inject checkpoint guidance/env vars into runtime execution, and emit checkpoint lifecycle + commit events
Update ops/ROADMAP.md for Phase 24 Execution Checkpoints and renumber subsequent phases; add detailed exit criteria
Add checkpoint lifecycle integration coverage and adapt real OpenCode projection script to perform checkpoint completion
Project deterministic runtime stdout/stderr markers into observational events (RuntimeCommandObserved, RuntimeToolCallObserved, RuntimeTodoSnapshotUpdated, RuntimeNarrativeOutputObserved)
Integrate runtime projection in flow execution for both interactive and non-interactive paths while preserving existing runtime lifecycle/output events
Surface new runtime observational event labels in CLI and server event renderers
Add unit and integration coverage for runtime projection parsing, chunk boundaries, stderr handling, and end-to-end event emission
Update roadmap, architecture, and design docs to define projection invariants: telemetry-only, non-authoritative, best-effort
Emit TaskExecutionFrozen, TaskIntegratedIntoFlow, and FlowIntegrationLockAcquired events to enforce deterministic merge sequencing
Freeze flows at merge prepare, enforce per-flow integration token, and integrate tasks via dedicated integration/<flow>/<task> sandboxes with drift detection
Update merge command help to describe flow freeze, per-task sandboxes, and integration lock semantics
Refresh quickstart, CLI operational semantics, and roadmap with tightened merge protocol details and manual test requirements
Extend hivemind-test/test_merge.sh to assert FrozenForMerge â†’ Merged transitions and sentinel merge events
Introduce explicit retry modes (clean vs continue), persist selection on TaskExecution, and include retry_mode on TaskRetryRequested events
Conditionally reset execution worktrees/branches during retry based on retry_mode and default automatic retries to clean
Extend task retry command with --mode clean|continue flag
Add integration coverage verifying clean retries wipe worktrees while continue retries preserve them and that events capture retry_mode
Update architecture, design, and quickstart docs to describe retry mode semantics
Require reason + record attribution for human verification overrides and allow overriding automated outcomes
Add CLI integration coverage asserting human overrides can force success after failed required checks and are audited via events
Align CLI operational semantics for verify override with expanded override states and required reason
Add verification check types (CheckConfig, CheckResult) with backward-compatible deserialization
Execute automated verification checks in task worktrees during verification, capturing exit code, combined output, and duration
Emit check lifecycle events (CheckStarted, CheckCompleted) and store per-attempt check results in derived state
Add verification commands: verify run <task-id> and verify results <attempt-id>
Add graph command to configure checks on graph tasks: graph add-check <graph-id> <task-id>
Block task success when required checks fail (transition to Retry/Failed based on retry policy)
Add CLI integration coverage asserting failed required checks are observable via events and surfaced via verify results
Emit scope enforcement outcome events (ScopeValidated, ScopeViolationDetected) after post-execution verification
Enforce scope post-execution by verifying filesystem + git operations; violations are fatal to the attempt and preserve the worktree for debugging
Extend baseline artifacts to capture local git branches for reliable git scope detection
Add CLI integration coverage asserting scope violations are observable, fatal, and preserve worktrees
Harden CLI JSON/YAML success envelopes and align error exit codes for beta Tier regression scripts (attach-repo, task inspect, runtime-set, etc.)
Update CLI operational semantics and error-model docs to reflect ErrorOccurred emission policy and structured error envelopes
Add optional --interactive flag to flow tick to run the configured runtime in an interactive session
Implement PTY-backed interactive execution in the OpenCode adapter with live output streaming and deterministic Ctrl+C handling
Persist interactive runtime input and interrupt events (RuntimeInputProvided, RuntimeInterrupted) for full observability
Extend flow tick execution to support interactive runtime sessions while preserving existing TaskFlow semantics
Label and surface the new runtime interaction event types in CLI and server event rendering
Add end-to-end Quickstart guide (humans + LLM operators) covering setup, runtime configuration, task/graph/flow execution, event inspection, and merge protocol
Improve CLI --help discoverability for core commands and clarify dependency and merge semantics
Harden merge workflow to handle git identity configuration reliably and auto-resolve certain dependency-ordered conflicts during merge preparation
Ensure merge preparation is safely re-runnable when previous runs recorded conflicts
Add per-project runtime configuration persisted as events (adapter, binary path, args, env, timeout)
Add project runtime configuration command (project runtime-set)
Invoke the configured runtime from flow tick and persist attempt-correlated runtime output and filesystem observation
Persist filesystem observation as RuntimeFilesystemObserved event
Improve attempt inspect to query attempt-correlated runtime events and optionally show output and file changes
Remove obsolete AdapterEvent layer in favor of core EventPayload runtime lifecycle events
Fix Makefile coverage target for cargo-llvm-cov compatibility
Capture per-attempt filesystem baselines and persist them as artifacts for replay-safe diff computation
Compute created/modified/deleted files and unified diffs at task completion, persisting diff artifacts
Emit new diff-related events: AttemptStarted, BaselineCaptured, FileModified, DiffComputed, CheckpointCommitCreated
Add manual task execution boundary commands: task start and task complete
Extend attempt inspect to support --diff and show stored unified diff output
Align runtime adapter contract with Initialize/Prepare/Execute/Terminate lifecycle
Add persisted runtime lifecycle events (RuntimeStarted/RuntimeOutputChunk/RuntimeExited/RuntimeTerminated)
Extend event listing to label runtime lifecycle events
Create isolated git worktrees per task under .hivemind/worktrees
Add worktree CLI commands: worktree list, inspect, cleanup
Provision task worktrees on flow start and clean up on verification success (configurable)
Run the test suite with cargo-nextest in CI
Prefer cargo-nextest locally when available (Makefile)
